## OWebDataStore.remove() method

Removes data with the given key.

When the key is a regexp all data with a key name that match the given regexp will be removed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
remove(key: string | RegExp): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string \| RegExp |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
